name: T-Minus
description:
T-Minus is a fast-paced puzzle game set in a journal, as well as the first game I made in Unity. It was also nominated to be presented at the NYU Game Center’s End of Year Show. The main mechanic is Rewind, where by holding E for varying lengths in time, all objects with the exception of the player will go back to exactly where they were before. This was a solo project, and so while the art isn’t exceptional, I’m happy with the core mechanic and hope to one day flesh it out much more.

Use WASD to move and hold E to rewind.
